title: Sentimental Religious Proverbs 31:28 Mother Pen and Bookmark Gift Set
features: The Scripture reads, Her children arise up, and call her blessed. Proverbs 31:28
description: Front of bookmark reads: Mother There is a priceless beauty in the faith-filled heart of a Mother. You are a blessing and a treasure to your family. God Bless you, Mom. Back of bookmark reads: Dear Lord, please bless our mothers in a way that only You can. Be with them in every moment and in every way. Hold each and every one of them in the palm of Your hand, blessing them in abundance with Your strength, Your joy, and Your undying love. In Jesus' name we pray. Amen. Her children arise up, and call her blessed. Proverbs 31:28.
